reviews.review: Give this game a chance, its a challenge but the grind is worth it! Once you gain the map knowledge and learn how to loop, the game becomes soo much more fun! Also the DLCs are amazing. The only downside is the hit boxes they're very hit or miss (no pun intended)

Если вы собрались поиграть за сурва (virgin), то нужно починить 5 генераторов и выйти в ворота.
Получилось - пишите GG. Если нет, то напишите маньяку, что он нуб и неправильно играет, чекните его профиль и напишите -rep что бы все знали, что он очень нехороший человек. 
Если вы маньяк (chad), то купите в довесок DLS на Кожаное лицо (более известный как Бубба, чемпион, владыка) и после первого повешенного стойте неподалеку с перком незаметность, даря повешенному возможность любоваться вашим великолепием. В конце катки вас ждут восторженные отзывы о вашей игре и теплые пожелания от ваших соперников(15 летних отцов).Так же у него есть перк для получения больше очков для прокачки. Рекомендую.

This game is great! Wonderful thrills as both the survivor and the killer. Mostly everyone is nice and will give you helpful tips, since the tutorials only show you so much. I got this after watching a friend play it. The only thing is that the graphics are very detailed so sometimes they look a bit choppy, but everything else is great! Loved the All-Kill DLC

My biggest issue in dbd is the community, both sides whine a lot about nothing that really matters. 
Camping/Tunneling/Tea bagging/Clicking/Pointing is not toxic nor against the rules yet everyone wants to cry about it. 
At the end of the day it's just a game that is meant to be played and played however you want.

Sure, the hit registration is decent at best but hey.... that's DBD for ya

This game is your typical killer survivor game, but with a twist. You can go against well known killers like Micheal Myers, Scream, The Demogrogen, The pig from jigsaw, Freddy Kruegar, And even Leatherface from the chainsaw massacre. I give this game a 10/10, cannot stop playing it.

Jogo muito bom, a jogabilidade muito boa e com dinâmicas bem únicas em um jogo, está sempre sendo atualizado e contém vários personagens icônicos de filmes de terror que marcaram época.
Pode até ter gráficos bem ruins mas está passando por reworks e ficando um pouco melhor.
Mesmo assim recomendo comprar o jogo, que está por um preço bem justo e vai te trazer horas de diverção.

it's like Marmite, you either love it so much you put so much time into playing it because it's awesome or you absolutely despise it because the community is full of toxic salty sweaty trolls who enjoy ruining the game for everyone and playing with immoral tactics that make you angry

Do you love the thrill of the chase? Do you love the sound of generators and screaming at midnight? Do you love dark dingy basements? Then you will love this game!

No joke though--this is a lot of fun with friends. :-)

This game is amazing. Sure, it has bugs and imperfections, like any game, but it's such a nice community, great game concept and new content constantly, fan service and just.. An awesome community, really. The game is pretty simple, easy to learn and once you get the hang of it, any game can be a great game or a bad game for you, and it makes you want to play more. If you have a chance to try it out, go for it, I highly doubt you'll regret it. Playing with friends make it all the better.

This game is extremely unique, and I will always recommend at least trying it for that reason alone. Unfortunetly, it is VERY much a "rough diamond" because devs have very weird priorities with how they go about updating and balancing. Key points that have to do with this is that the game is balanced for groups of survivors that have 3rd party communication...

AT THE SAME TIME the devs create abilities in the game that are completely invalid if you have 3rd party comms AND there is no in-game communication what-so-ever besides *point* and *follow me* gestures

They also have problems with actually addressing bugs and glitches in a timely manner, even though they can make 10 new cosmetic items every few months($10 dollars per cosmetic outfit)(also there is like 20DLCs for this game)

It sounds like I don't like this game but I really do, and this is a very common sentiment in the community, a very great and lovable game with some agonizing flaws that you choose to deal with.
